column1: The  Appellant  has  failed  to  specifically  plead  in  the  petition  to  the  High  Court  any  grounds

column2: forming exceptional  circumstances.  In  any event,  having carefully considered the judgment of

column4: that  no  exceptional  circumstances  exist  which

column2: warranted the High Court to exercise its revisionary powers.
For the foregoing reasons  and  subject to my findings on the purported defective caption,  I see
no  reason  to interfere with the order of the learned  High  Court judge of the Western  Province
